title: Black screen after joining into champ select.
body: I clicked accept and as i loaded into the game i just got a black screen.  Is this a known bug or what?

replies.body:
Is there a possibility of players being compensated for issues caused by this? because i lost 31 LP because of it.

Edit: WITH low spec mode enabled

As *Lew* mentioned, there's a known bug that we're tracking in the post they linked. If this is indeed happening to you, I recommend swapping over to the legacy client (from login) for now until the issue has been resolved. I also recommend sending us some League Client logs using the instructions in the linked post, as it will help us find a solution much faster!

I hope this cleared up the confusion.
Yeah it is a known bug and there is a pinned [post ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client)about it.
